creator: Jack Kessler
title: OPINION - Airport lounges are victims of their own success, they’re now far too popular
dc:creator: Jack Kessler
content: Forget The Bishops Avenue in north London, Billionaire’s Row in Manhattan or Mount Nicholson in Hong Kong. The most expensive real estate in the world can be found on an aeroplane.Every inch — from the cardboard excuse for a seat in economy class to the luxuriant flat beds in first — must be accounted for. Still, in terms of price per square foot, airport lounges ought to be in the top 10. And they are booming.
contentSnippet: Forget The Bishops Avenue in north London, Billionaire’s Row in Manhattan or Mount Nicholson in Hong Kong. The most expensive real estate in the world can be found on an aeroplane.Every inch — from the cardboard excuse for a seat in economy class to the luxuriant flat beds in first — must be accounted for. Still, in terms of price per square foot, airport lounges ought to be in the top 10. And they are booming.

creator: George Chesterton
title: OPINION - Abusing the word ‘genocide’ about Israel is dangerous and spectacularly ignorant
dc:creator: George Chesterton
content: The “Let’s Keep The World Clean” placard with the figure of someone throwing the Israeli flag into a dustbin finally made its way to Trafalgar Square last weekend. It was only a matter of time. We have arrived at the point at which protesters accusing Israel of genocide are simultaneously calling for genocide against Israel. If only there was some example from recent history to help them understand what genocide really means.
contentSnippet: The “Let’s Keep The World Clean” placard with the figure of someone throwing the Israeli flag into a dustbin finally made its way to Trafalgar Square last weekend. It was only a matter of time. We have arrived at the point at which protesters accusing Israel of genocide are simultaneously calling for genocide against Israel. If only there was some example from recent history to help them understand what genocide really means.
